alert.note: Alert for Adair; Casey (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Russell, south central Casey and central Adair Counties through 715 PM EDT/615 PM CDT/... At 643 PM EDT/543 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Columbia, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Some weak rotation has also been noted. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jamestown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
